cause.description:
MKK stands for Manav Kalyan Kendra, which means Center for Human Welfare. Our goal is to:
- Provide scholarships and educational support to bright and needy high school seniors and colege students in the Washington, DC metropolitan area.
- Provide scholarships and educational support to bright and needy children in India, especially in the slums of New Delhi.
- Support educational programs in selected intermediate, vocational and higher education institutions in India, especially in New Delhi.
- Support related humanitarian and educational programs - worldwide.
- Support humanitarian, medical and environmental clean-up efforts in the slums of New Delhi.
- Organize high-quality cultural events to help raise money for scholarships.
1. Making a difference in the lives of children, one child at a time.
2. Help needy children get education and become self-supporting.
3. Provide humanitarian aid in emergencies.
cause.mission: Provide educational support and humanitarin aid for needy, bright children
